alert.note: Alert for Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 23 at 9:17AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...flooding is possible. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...flooding is possible. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 530 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mermentau River near Mermentau. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 2.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 2.0 Tue 8 am CST 2.1 2.9 3.5 &&
